item.title: 俄罗斯人今天开始在总统选举中投票，普京的 24 年统治将至少延续到 2030 年，他很可能用这次选举来证明对其在乌克兰的 "特别军事行动 "的支持。这里是《中断的时代》。
item.description:
Russians began voting today in a presidential election set to extend Vladimir Putin’s 24-year rule until at least 2030 and which he is likely to use as proof of support for his “special military operation” in Ukraine. Here's Disrupted Times.https://t.co/eJoxKtJMno via @ft

— darrendodd (@darrendodd) March 15, 2024

item.title: 意见：一项严肃的法案将对向第三方出售任何社交媒体应用程序收集的任何数据实施隐私法规，无论该应用程序的所有者是谁。
item.description:
Opinion: A serious bill would impose privacy regulations on the sale to third parties of any data collected by any social media app, regardless of who owns it. https://t.co/j8b8QDnU1s pic.twitter.com/LMiOth2n1x

— Financial Times (@FT) March 15, 2024
